name: Lissajous Curves
description: Beautiful 3D Lissajous curves using different frequency ratios

functionCalls.code: const objects = []; const curves = [{a:1,b:2,c:3,color:'#ff0000'},{a:2,b:3,c:5,color:'#00ff00'},{a:3,b:4,c:2,color:'#0000ff'},{a:5,b:3,c:4,color:'#ffff00'},{a:4,b:5,c:3,color:'#ff00ff'}]; curves.forEach((curve, idx) => { const id = `lissajous_${idx}`; objects.push({ id, type: 'Sphere', position: [0, 5, 0], radius: 0.3, color: curve.color, nonPhysics: true, opacity: 0.8 }); globalNonPhysicsEngine.animateObject(id, { code: `mesh.position.x = 8 * Math.sin(${curve.a} * time); mesh.position.y = 5 + 8 * Math.sin(${curve.b} * time); mesh.position.z = 8 * Math.sin(${curve.c} * time); mesh.rotation.y = time;` }); }); return objects;
